cho_description:
Black steatite cippus; standards on either side of Harpocrates; eight registers of Gods and text in the field; 
other surfaces covered with rows of Hieroglyphic text; two fragments re-joined.

Depth 6.10cm, Height 19.50cm, Width 13.00cm

COL: http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/collection_online/collection_object_details.aspx?partId=1&objectId=101738

Made by Daniel Pett from 145 photographs taken with a OnePlus3 mobile phone,  split into two chunks and assembled in Photoscan.

**This cannot be set to download, as it is part of the British Museum touring exhibition Ancient Lives**
